thread.title: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday

title: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday
text:
Updated: 6:39 p.m. Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015 | Posted: 6:38 p.m. Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015 Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday ﻿ View Larger FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 file photo, Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont, smiles while speaking during a fundraiser at the Avalon Hollywood, in Los Angeles. Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will be a guest on Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night show, airing this week from Brooklyn, N.Y. Sanders will appear on ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok, File) View Larger FILE - In this Nov. 9, 2013 file photo, Michael J. Fox attends A Funny Thing Happened On The Way To Cure Parkinson’s benefit for The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research, in New York. Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will appear on ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. Kimmel’s show said another guest that night will be Fox, whose first “Back to the Future” film is marking its 30th anniversary. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) Sponsored Links The Associated Press LOS ANGELES — 
Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will be a guest on Jimmy Kimmel's late-night show, airing this week from Brooklyn, New York. 
The U.S. senator from Vermont is becoming quite the TV star. After taking part in the first Democratic candidates' debate, he was portrayed by Larry David on "Saturday Night Live" last weekend. 
The real Sanders will appear on ABC's "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" on Wednesday. 
Kimmel's show said another guest that night will be Michael J. Fox, whose first "Back to the Future" film is marking its 30th anniversary. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our FOX23 News This Morning Newsletter Sign Up
